    • forHost

      public ConnectionPoolSettings forHost(String host)
      This checks to see if there's a matching host override. When multiple patterns match, the first matching set of overrides is selected.
      Parameters:
      host - (undocumented)
      Returns:
      (undocumented)

    • transport

      public ClientTransport transport()
      Deprecated.
      Deprecated in favor of connectionSettings.transport. Since 10.1.0.
      The underlying transport used to connect to hosts. By default ClientTransport.TCP is used.
      Returns:
      (undocumented)

    • responseEntitySubscriptionTimeout

      public abstract scala.concurrent.duration.Duration responseEntitySubscriptionTimeout()
      The time after which the pool will drop an entity automatically if it wasn't read or discarded

    • withTransport

      public ConnectionPoolSettings withTransport(ClientTransport newValue)
      Since 10.1.0, the transport is configured in ClientConnectionSettings. This method is a shortcut for withUpdatedConnectionSettings(_.withTransport(newTransport)).
      Parameters:
      newValue - (undocumented)
      Returns:
      (undocumented)
